summary: Was X2 a sequel that surpassed the original X-Men film? Join Maddy and Ryan on their X-MEN PODCAST, the Mutant Ages, as they...
caption:
Was X2 a sequel that surpassed the original X-Men film?

Join Maddy and Ryan on their X-MEN PODCAST, the Mutant Ages, as they dive into this film with special guest Mary Ellen from Let’s Watch 2 Movies!

Ryan admits he saw this movie eight times in cinemas, and Maddy recounts all of the spoofs that she and Ryan made of this movie’s scenes as teenagers. Meanwhile, Mary Ellen has some important questions about how Mystique’s powers work. The word of the day is “jet.”

Listen to the podcast here!

Hi, my name's Maxime Garbarini.
I created the online comics label www.closecallcomics.com and i am the co-author & artist on HEROIC PATROL, its first webcomic.
I also love music: check back every week on http://masoupe.tumblr.com/ to find a new selection of cool tunes I selected on Spotify.
thanks guys and girls!

summary: Sensory Prompt: The taste of Vodka at the back of your throat  Requested by: Anonymous Note: I’ve never had alcohol, so this is...
body:
Sensory Prompt: The taste of Vodka at the back of your throat

Requested by: Anonymous

Note: I’ve never had alcohol, so this is kind of bullshitted, so…yeah

Pairing: Valkyrie x reader

Triggers: Mentions of drinking/alcohol      Gender: Any/Neutral

You tapped your fingers against the cold stone wall looking over the city, sometimes you just wanted to punch the Grandmaster in his smirky little face, the way he spoke to you sometimes infuriated you, making you want to leave the planet all together. But where would you go?

“Y/n” the cool voice brought you out of your angsty thoughts as Valkyrie appeared next to you, leaning against the stone.

“Valkyrie” you greeted, something about her presence calming you slightly

“Are you alright?”

“I will be”

She nodded her head slightly. She was there, when the Grandmaster spoke to you, well, spoke at you, in front of dozens of others. He loved embarrassing others, though, not always on purpose.

“You know he doesn’t think before he speaks”

You sighed “I know, but that doesn’t make it any easier not to hit him”

She smirked “Well, if you ever decide to hit him, just make sure I’m in the room. I’d love to see that”

“See what? Me getting melted by his staff weapon?”

“No, that wouldn’t happen. I wouldn’t let it”

You looked over at her, seeing the seriousness on her face, though it was mixed with amusement. 

Seeing her each towards her pocket, she pulled out a flask. After taking a drink she offered it to you. Taking it you brought it to your lips, taking a long sip. The almost burning liquid sliding down your throat, sending light tingles down your spine.

When you brought it away from your lips you sighed, feeling a little better as the drink began to calm your nerves, leaving behind the tingle. You handed it back to Valkyrie “Thanks”

She smiled at you “There’s nothing a great drink can’t cure” she took another drink before she slid the flask back into her pocket.

“Have you ever though about leaving? Going back through?” you stared at the large red portal in the sky.

“Yes and no” she muttered “I don’t know where I’d go”

“Asgard?” you suggested. You were one of the very few people in existence who knew of her past.

“No. I wouldn’t go back there” You nodded, seeing her look at you “You’re not thinking of leaving are you?” you could hear what almost sounded like concern in her voice.

You sighed “I don’t know, maybe. But like you, I’d have no where to go”

There was a moment of silence before she turned to you “I think this is the type of situation that takes more than one drink”

You looked over at her, seeing a small smirk on her face, she motioned her head back towards the doors. Standing up straight, you followed her through the doors and towards the nearest bar.

summary: Ok so my little brother has always been a bit sexist. I’ve been trying to get him away from that kind of mindset for a while,...
body: Ok so my little brother has always been a bit sexist. I’ve been trying to get him away from that kind of mindset for a while, trying to educate him, etc, but it never really worked. Today we were talking about female marvel superheroes and I thought he was gonna go off about how he thinks they’re stupid and pointless or whatever but no. He’s super fucking excited. He called Valkyrie a badass and is talking about how there’s not that many female superheroes and he thinks it’s cool that they’re getting some of their own movies. It’s a small victory but I’ll take what I can get.

He called Valkyrie a badass and is talking about how there’s not that many female superheroes and he thinks it’s cool that they’re getting some of their own movies. blog.name: ragnarokdad
blog.title: marvel hell
blog.description: sideblog for my writing shenanigans (at the moment mostly marvel). main is intrepidety. just a big ol' fan of thor. she/her

summary: 86 and 70 Thorbruce? I thought it would be hilarious and interesting
question: 86 and 70 Thorbruce? I thought it would be hilarious and interesting
answer:
Aaah yes I love this!! Locked in a room + I didn’t mean to turn you on from this prompt list.

The stealth mission was not going terribly yet. Bruce, who for the purpose of this mission was not in Hulk formation, felt rather useless sneaking through the halls of the lair with Thor, but the rest did not seem to mind. 

‘Watch out!’ Thor breathed suddenly, pushing Bruce into an open closet in the side of the hallway, causing him to fall back on a pile of cardboard boxes. Moments later, Thor tumbled in after, behind him and falling on top of Bruce, the door shutting behind him. 

‘What? What is it?’ asked Bruce. ‘You’re squishing me.’ 

‘Guards,’ muttered Thor, his face close to Bruce’s. ‘Be quiet.’ 

‘You’re squishi-’ 

Thor covered Bruce’s mouth with his hand. ‘Sh.’ 

Stubbornly, Bruce licked Thor’s hand. 

‘That’s disgusting, don’t do that,’ Thor told Bruce, and Bruce scowled back. 

‘Don’t give me that look, it’s for your own good,’ Thor said. He tried to listen for the guard’s footsteps to pass, but there was no sound of them yet. Instead, he shifted slightly, so that both of them would be more comfortable in the cramped space. 

‘Isn’t this romantic?’ said Thor with a grin. Bruce mumbled something and blushed furiously. Finally, Thor relented and removed his hand. 

‘Your knee is almost in my crotch, Thor, for the love of god can you-’ 

‘Don’t you like it there?’ said Thor teasingly. Then he realised- 

Oh. Oh. Bruce did like it there. 

‘Bruce-’ 

‘Not. A. Word,’ Bruce whispered furiously, growing redder by the moment. 

‘Are you sure?’ said Thor with a grin. ‘You don’t even know what I was about to say.’ 

Bruce gave him a look. ‘Fine, what were you about to say?’ 

‘Maybe I could do something to help you out,’ said Thor in a low voice. Bruce’s eyes widened, and Thor bridged the distance between the two of them, his lips meeting Bruce’s. 

The kiss was urgent and sloppy, and Thor’s hands travelled down Bruce’s chest until- 

‘Thor,’ Bruce gasped. ‘No, not here.’ 

‘Fine,’ Thor mumbled, agreeing that the closet of a villain’s lair probably wasn’t the best place to fool around in. 

‘We should- we should probably check is the coast is clear,’ Bruce breathed, and Thor reluctantly got up, going for the doorknob. 

It was locked. 

‘I… think we might be locked in,’ Thor murmured. 

Bruce got to his feet. ‘That’s not funny-’ 

‘I’m serious,’ said Thor, rattling the doorknob to no avail. He went for the communication system between him and the rest of the group. ‘So uh, Bruce and I may be trapped in a closet.’ 

Natasha’s annoyed sigh was the first to come through. ‘Fine, stay put. We’re doing alright without you; we’ll come break you out later.’ 

‘Uh, okay, fine,’ responded Thor, and switched off the communicator again. 

He turned to Bruce and grinned. ‘Looks like we have a little more time than we thought.’
answer_abstract:
Aaah yes I love this!! Locked in a room + I didn’t mean to turn you on from this prompt list.

‘Watch out!’ Thor breathed suddenly, pushing Bruce into an open closet in the side of the hallway, causing him to fall back on a pile of cardboard boxes. Moments later, Thor tumbled in after, behind him and falling on top of Bruce, the door shutting behind him.

‘Uh, okay, fine,’ responded Thor, and switched off the communicator again. 

He turned to Bruce and grinned. ‘Looks like we have a little more time than we thought.’

trail.content_raw:
Aaah yes I love this!! Locked in a room + I didn’t mean to turn you on from this prompt list.

The stealth mission was not going terribly yet. Bruce, who for the purpose of this mission was not in Hulk formation, felt rather useless sneaking through the halls of the lair with Thor, but the rest did not seem to mind. 

‘Watch out!’ Thor breathed suddenly, pushing Bruce into an open closet in the side of the hallway, causing him to fall back on a pile of cardboard boxes. Moments later, Thor tumbled in after, behind him and falling on top of Bruce, the door shutting behind him. 

[[MORE]]

‘What? What is it?’ asked Bruce. ‘You’re squishing me.’ 

‘Guards,’ muttered Thor, his face close to Bruce’s. ‘Be quiet.’ 

‘You’re squishi-’ 

Thor covered Bruce’s mouth with his hand. ‘Sh.’ 

Stubbornly, Bruce licked Thor’s hand. 

‘That’s disgusting, don’t do that,’ Thor told Bruce, and Bruce scowled back. 

‘Don’t give me that look, it’s for your own good,’ Thor said. He tried to listen for the guard’s footsteps to pass, but there was no sound of them yet. Instead, he shifted slightly, so that both of them would be more comfortable in the cramped space. 

‘Isn’t this romantic?’ said Thor with a grin. Bruce mumbled something and blushed furiously. Finally, Thor relented and removed his hand. 

‘Your knee is almost in my crotch, Thor, for the love of god can you-’ 

‘Don’t you like it there?’ said Thor teasingly. Then he realised- 

Oh. Oh. Bruce did like it there. 

‘Bruce-’ 

‘Not. A. Word,’ Bruce whispered furiously, growing redder by the moment. 

‘Are you sure?’ said Thor with a grin. ‘You don’t even know what I was about to say.’ 

Bruce gave him a look. ‘Fine, what were you about to say?’ 

‘Maybe I could do something to help you out,’ said Thor in a low voice. Bruce’s eyes widened, and Thor bridged the distance between the two of them, his lips meeting Bruce’s. 

The kiss was urgent and sloppy, and Thor’s hands travelled down Bruce’s chest until- 

‘Thor,’ Bruce gasped. ‘No, not here.’ 

‘Fine,’ Thor mumbled, agreeing that the closet of a villain’s lair probably wasn’t the best place to fool around in. 

‘We should- we should probably check is the coast is clear,’ Bruce breathed, and Thor reluctantly got up, going for the doorknob. 

It was locked. 

‘I… think we might be locked in,’ Thor murmured. 

Bruce got to his feet. ‘That’s not funny-’ 

‘I’m serious,’ said Thor, rattling the doorknob to no avail. He went for the communication system between him and the rest of the group. ‘So uh, Bruce and I may be trapped in a closet.’ 

Natasha’s annoyed sigh was the first to come through. ‘Fine, stay put. We’re doing alright without you; we’ll come break you out later.’ 

‘Uh, okay, fine,’ responded Thor, and switched off the communicator again. 

He turned to Bruce and grinned. ‘Looks like we have a little more time than we thought.’
trail.content:
Aaah yes I love this!! Locked in a room + I didn’t mean to turn you on from this prompt list.

The stealth mission was not going terribly yet. Bruce, who for the purpose of this mission was not in Hulk formation, felt rather useless sneaking through the halls of the lair with Thor, but the rest did not seem to mind. 

‘Watch out!’ Thor breathed suddenly, pushing Bruce into an open closet in the side of the hallway, causing him to fall back on a pile of cardboard boxes. Moments later, Thor tumbled in after, behind him and falling on top of Bruce, the door shutting behind him. 

‘What? What is it?’ asked Bruce. ‘You’re squishing me.’ 

‘Guards,’ muttered Thor, his face close to Bruce’s. ‘Be quiet.’ 

‘You’re squishi-’ 

Thor covered Bruce’s mouth with his hand. ‘Sh.’ 

Stubbornly, Bruce licked Thor’s hand. 

‘That’s disgusting, don’t do that,’ Thor told Bruce, and Bruce scowled back. 

‘Don’t give me that look, it’s for your own good,’ Thor said. He tried to listen for the guard’s footsteps to pass, but there was no sound of them yet. Instead, he shifted slightly, so that both of them would be more comfortable in the cramped space. 

‘Isn’t this romantic?’ said Thor with a grin. Bruce mumbled something and blushed furiously. Finally, Thor relented and removed his hand. 

‘Your knee is almost in my crotch, Thor, for the love of god can you-’ 

‘Don’t you like it there?’ said Thor teasingly. Then he realised- 

Oh. Oh. Bruce did like it there. 

‘Bruce-’ 

‘Not. A. Word,’ Bruce whispered furiously, growing redder by the moment. 

‘Are you sure?’ said Thor with a grin. ‘You don’t even know what I was about to say.’ 

Bruce gave him a look. ‘Fine, what were you about to say?’ 

‘Maybe I could do something to help you out,’ said Thor in a low voice. Bruce’s eyes widened, and Thor bridged the distance between the two of them, his lips meeting Bruce’s. 

The kiss was urgent and sloppy, and Thor’s hands travelled down Bruce’s chest until- 

‘Thor,’ Bruce gasped. ‘No, not here.’ 

‘Fine,’ Thor mumbled, agreeing that the closet of a villain’s lair probably wasn’t the best place to fool around in. 

‘We should- we should probably check is the coast is clear,’ Bruce breathed, and Thor reluctantly got up, going for the doorknob. 

It was locked. 

‘I… think we might be locked in,’ Thor murmured. 

Bruce got to his feet. ‘That’s not funny-’ 

‘I’m serious,’ said Thor, rattling the doorknob to no avail. He went for the communication system between him and the rest of the group. ‘So uh, Bruce and I may be trapped in a closet.’ 

Natasha’s annoyed sigh was the first to come through. ‘Fine, stay put. We’re doing alright without you; we’ll come break you out later.’ 

‘Uh, okay, fine,’ responded Thor, and switched off the communicator again. 

He turned to Bruce and grinned. ‘Looks like we have a little more time than we thought.’

Aaah yes I love this!! Locked in a room + I didn’t mean to turn you on from this prompt list.

The stealth mission was not going terribly yet. Bruce, who for the purpose of this mission was not in Hulk formation, felt rather useless sneaking through the halls of the lair with Thor, but the rest did not seem to mind. 

‘Watch out!’ Thor breathed suddenly, pushing Bruce into an open closet in the side of the hallway, causing him to fall back on a pile of cardboard boxes. Moments later, Thor tumbled in after, behind him and falling on top of Bruce, the door shutting behind him.

summary: the Avengers (a rewrite) - screamingarrows - The Avengers (Marvel Movies) [Archive of Our Own]
title: the Avengers (a rewrite) - screamingarrows - The Avengers (Marvel Movies) [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 1/1
Fandom: The Avengers (Marvel Movies)
Rating: Not Rated
Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
Characters: Tony Stark, Thor (Marvel), Steve Rogers, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Clint Barton, Bruce Banner, Loki (Marvel)
Additional Tags: Canon Rewrite, Jeon Jungkook is a Little Shit, added a little bit more emotion
Series: Part 1 of the MCU (a rewrite).
Summary:

There was an idea called the Avengers Initiative. The idea was to bring together a group of remarkable people, see if they could become something more. See if they could work together when we needed them to, to fight the battles that we never could.

A small rewrite fic

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Coffee, Kids and Love
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2m8Sftb

by naths

This is a mix of the classic coffee-shop au and single father Tony Stark au feat kid Peter Parker.

They rarely spoke more than 2 minutes with each other. That wasn´t jokes and flirty sarcasm also he didn´t know if Tony read the same into their interactions as he did. Sure Tony started it and certainly flirted back, but maybe that was just how the men were.
Therefore it took Steve by surprise when Tony came in one day at the end of the second month of his absence and with a child in his arms.
“Hey there Captain Handsome,”

Words: 1048, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Steve Rogers, Tony Stark, Peter Parker, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Pepper Potts, Happy - Character, James “Bucky” Barnes, Wanda Maximoff, Clint Barton
  • Relationships: Steve Rogers/Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Coffee Shops & Cafés, Parent Tony Stark, Kid Peter Parker, Fluff and Humor, Flirting, Dating, Awkward Flirting, Slow Romance, First Kiss, Mild Smut, Superfamily maybe, Happy Ending later in the Story


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2m8Sftb

body:
Ironstrange?

Tony Stark is literally married to Pepper and he even brought up the idea of having a family and y’all still out here shipping him with Stephen Strange??
